concept.title: A Day Dedicated to Breakfast!
concept.shortdesc: A wise man once said, "All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast." These detailed topics will show all the tools and ingredients needed to make a grand slam breakfast!

conbody.p: Hello! You are lucky enough to have a day where breakfast is the #1 priority. I mean who doesn't just love to indulge in a savory or sweet yummy breakfast treats. Whether its a mile high stack of pancakes or smoked salmon eggs benedict, breakfast is sure to put a smile on your face. This guide will illustrate everything needed to successfully create the greatest breakfast of all time!
